ai-tha-ap206:1.2_0: the Lord of Men, the Lord of Men,
ai-tha-ap206:1.4_0: on the bank of the Ganges river.
ai-tha-ap206:2.1_0: Many Kinds that are even level:
ai-tha-ap206:2.3_0: sent a message to the Community of monks.
ai-tha-ap206:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap206:3.4_0: This is the fruit of refuge.
ai-tha-ap206:4.2_0: they were reborn in the five states of existence.
ai-tha-ap206:5.2_0: I was born in the family!
ai-tha-ap206:5.4_0: I went forth in the Teacher’s teaching.
ai-tha-ap206:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tissa.
ai-tha-ap206:8.1_0: the fourth Elder Accomplished amongst those who were very seated
